description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a behavioral science major. Eligibility Requirements Must be a behavioral science major at UCO Preference will be given to students within the Department of Psychology Minimum 3.0 GPA Please include a short summary demonstrating financial need for this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
